name: The Sunny Day 晴天
description: In the story, the player plays the KUI, a 14-year-old girl with mental illness, who falls into her own spiritual world for an unknown reason during a daily activity. Players must pass through puzzles and various strange characters to communicate. The player's attitude toward various items in the game will affect the outcome of the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.4GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA  GTX 560SE DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
